microservicesApplications.name: Architecting and developing modern and scalable applications based on microservices

levelUp.name: LevelUp - Professional Transformation
levelUp.description: "LevelUp Front-end React" a program offered by PUC Minas and partner companies. 40 classroom hours and 20 virtual hours distributed in technical training activities, project development with visits to companies and behavioral training.

omnistack11.description2: A week designed to motivate people to raise their careers as programmers getting to know the Node.JS, React and React Native stack for Front-end, Back-end and Mobile development.

imageProcessing.name: Mammography images classifier
imageProcessing.description: A program that reads images from mammography exams and seeks to differentiate breast density in order to identify tumors or other problems.
